title: Skin issue on team builder
body: Every time I do team builder, I select my skin, Actually its auto selected for me most times. However, by the time the load screen gets up, my skin reverts back to the original skin. It so far is happening to me with JINX. I don't know if it does it to other champions because I am a JINX only kinda girl but its happening and its frustrating.

replies.body: This has also been happening to me for all of my skins! Really needs to be fixed soon because I feel like I've totally wasted my money.
Happening with Teemo, morgana and Blitz as well.

got bloodlord vlad, what bloodlord vlad more like :(
been happening to me in teambuilder, 5v5's blind, and 3v3's 

http://imgur.com/nYwwOVi
as you can see in the picture it appears as if they are both selected.
This is a known issue with teambuilder - for now, Switch to normal skin, then back to the one you want, and that should work around the issue :-) You'll need to do it each game though!
